str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.
From kleros and the base of nomos (reflexively) getting by apportionment); a sharer by lot, i.e. Inheritor; by implication, a possessor.
From kleros and the base of nomos (reflexively) getting by apportionment); a sharer by lot, i.e. Inheritor; by implication, a possessor.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A joint heir, participant. From sun and kleronomos; a co-heir, i.e. participant in common.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
If indeed, if so. From ei and per; if perhaps.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To suffer together with, sympathize. From sun and pascho; to experience pain jointly or of the same kind.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

word: we may also be glorified with [Him].
parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To glorify together with. From sun and doxazo; to exalt to dignity in company with.
